column4: stvn:thanks for the xine link, i got gxine up and running, btw is acpi str supported in linux?

stvn:is there any desktop calendar app, which lists the tasks done(or to be done) per day, while also showing the overall progress(like no.of tasks completed out of total tasks for that project) of a big project comprised of a no.of tasks?
evolution is integrated with the panel calendar
